title: Virginia State Open Records Law - Request

communications.communication:
Dear Sir / Madam, 

Would it be possible for you to send me a copy of any records that would show some or all of the following information:

1.	A list of ALL types of alternative asset investments, including private equity, venture capital, distressed debt, mezzanine, fund of funds, infrastructure, natural resources, real estate and private debt partnerships in which City of Alexandria Post-Employment Benefit Trust is an investor; and
2.	For each partnership, may I please have a copy of any alternative assets investment records that would show some or all of the following information:

a.	City of Alexandria Post-Employment Benefit Trust's total commitment to the partnership,
b.	the total contributions made by City of Alexandria Post-Employment Benefit Trust to the partnership to date,
c.	the total distributions received by City of Alexandria Post-Employment Benefit Trust from the partnership to date,
d.	the estimated current value of City of Alexandria Post-Employment Benefit Trust's holding in the partnership, and
e.	any available estimates of the Net and Gross IRR earned by City of Alexandria Post-Employment Benefit Trust to date on its investment in the partnership.

3.	In addition to this could you please provide me with an up to date account of your current asset allocations in the above asset classes including any direct investments you may have.

Thank you very much for your attention to this request. In the event that City of Alexandria Post-Employment Benefit Trust has no such investments, a simple note to this effect will suffice.  We understand that we may be charged for the cost of the copies requested, and agree to pay these charges. 

Thank you again for your attention to this request. 

Yours faithfully,
